short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to make developer's life a little bit faster!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sick of selecting and copying code from stack overflow over and over again?

'Stack Overflow Copier' Extension is here to make your developer's experience a little bit better!

Simply click on the code box, and hit 'Shift + c' to copy the whole box into your clipboard!

The key binding can be changed to your liking by clicking on the extension from the extension menu!
